question:
Which among the following statements is/ are correct?
1. Per capita availability of Milk in Odisha is lower than All India average.
2. Operation flood is associated with milk production
3. Father of White Revolution in India is MS Swaminathan
4. Manda breed of buffalo has the highest fat content in milk among the south Odishan breeds
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Per capita availability of milk in Odisha (2018-19) is 145 gms/ day. All India\'s average is 394 gms/ day. The Father of the White Revolution in India is Verghese Kurien.
